src/services/webhook_service.py.purpose: Async webhook delivery service with retry mechanism

patterns_discovered: HMAC signature generation for webhook security
Comprehensive logging of webhook delivery attempts
Async HTTP client with timeout management
gotchas_discovered: Handling webhook delivery failures without breaking main application flow
Preventing response body size abuse via truncation
Managing database sessions for each webhook operation
Implementing flexible retry logic with configurable attempts and backoff
Ensuring thread-safety and non-blocking webhook delivery
recommendations: Consider implementing circuit breaker pattern for persistent webhook failures
Add more granular error tracking and potential webhook disabling on repeated failures
Create comprehensive monitoring and alerting for webhook delivery performance
